sentences.en: a meeting with an important client
sentences.cn: 与一位重要客户的会面

sentences.en: A reflexologist can often tell what is wrong with his client by the condition of certain parts of the feet.
sentences.cn: 足疗师往往可以根据顾客足部某个部位的情况判断其病症所在。
每位客户的投资组合都是量身打造的。

sentences.en: Enviros Consulting has a client base of more than 2,000 organisations worldwide.
sentences.cn: EnvirosConsulting公司在全世界拥有逾2,000家组织机构的客户群。

sentences.en: He arranges to collect the payment from the customer, thus saving the client the paperwork.
sentences.cn: 他安排直接向顾客收取费用，免去了顾客填写各种文件的麻烦。

sentences.en: He might have been murdered by a former client or someone harbouring a grudge.
sentences.cn: 他可能已经被以前的客户或某个对他怀恨在心的人谋杀了。

sentences.en: I could hear the director teeing off on his client's complaint as usual.
sentences.cn: 我能听到主任又像平时一样对客户的抱怨发火.

sentences.en: If anyone wants me, I'm at lunch with a client.
sentences.cn: 有人找我，就说我在跟客户吃午餐。

sentences.en: It was a mark of his unfamiliarity with Hollywood that he didn't understand that an agent was paid out of his client's share.
sentences.cn: 他居然不知道经纪人的报酬得从其客户的收入中出，这说明他对好莱坞太不了解了。

sentences.en: Mr Milner persuaded the federal prosecutors not to lock up his client.
sentences.cn: 米尔纳先生说服联邦检察官不把他的当事人关起来。
法官大人，我的当事人认罪。

sentences.en: My lord, I am instructed by my client to claim that the evidence has been tampered with.
sentences.cn: 法官大人，本人受当事人委托，主张此证据已被人篡改。

sentences.en: Now and then I referred a client to him.
sentences.cn: 我不时地介绍客户给他。

sentences.en: She can't come to the telephone; she's serving a client.
sentences.cn: 她不能来接电话, 她正在接待一位顾客.

sentences.en: She remained in the doorway, listening to his litany of complaints against her client.
sentences.cn: 她站在门口，听他喋喋不休地抱怨她的客户。
代理处为客户开具发票。

phrases.tran_cn: 客户保密的责任；机密性客户机程序
客户服务；向委托部门提供服务
瘦客户机；瘦客户端；精简型电脑

trans.tran_en: someone who gets services or advice from a professional person, company, or organization
